name: Style Guide Kit 2.0 by Sinto Wahid (Community)
description:
Hi there! Finally, I launched my first style guide in Figma Community.


A style guide makes workflow more seamless and this is a reusable file as well as hopefully could help you in making a foundation for a design system.

-

*Note

You can use this file for a project or your personal use. But you don't have a right to resell or retribute this file.

-

Support me on Figma Community with a like or a comment that I can work more to update this file in the future! 


For more support click here 

https://www.paypal.me/sintowahid

-

Have a great project? Let's talk about it through my email at:

s.wahid2001@gmail.com
